articles.title: About Me
articles.contents:
Interests
I first became passionate about protecting the environment since high school. I enjoyed going on hikes and picking up trash with my school’s environmental club.
Along with my environmental work, I recently started creating content on Twitch. I try to play nature related games along with the usual video games I grew to love.
Experience/Projects
I attended UCLA for my bachelor’s in Environmental Science with a minor in Conservation Biology from 2011-2015. This was where I learned about the chaparral and coastal sage scrubs ecosystems in California. Here is where I also started developing my GIS skills. I earned a GIS certificate at UCLA extension.

            Jennifer Truong
          
          
            
              I am a Master’s Candidate at the Bren school of Environmental Science & Management at UC Santa Barbara. I am currently researching on forest management and conservation in Southern California. My intersts lie in urban ecology, fire ecology, and data science.
